statements: SELECT city, temperature FROM WeatherData WHERE humidity > 70
SELECT rainfall, humidity, city FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature < 25
SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE city = 'New York'
SELECT city, rainfall FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30
SELECT disease_prediction FROM WeatherData WHERE city = 'London'
SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE city = 'New York' ORDER BY temperature DESC, rainfall ASC
SELECT city, temperature, humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 70 ORDER BY city
SELECT city, disease_prediction FROM WeatherData WHERE disease_prediction = 'High' LIMIT 10
SELECT city, humidity, rainfall FROM WeatherData WHERE humidity > 80 ORDER BY city, humidity DESC
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS avg_temperature, MAX(rainfall) AS max_rainfall FROM WeatherData WHERE city LIKE 'C%'
SELECT * FROM Weather_Data WHERE temperature > 30
SELECT date, humidity FROM Weather_Data WHERE humidity < 50
SELECT temperature, date FROM Weather_Data ORDER BY date DESC
SELECT * FROM Crop_Diseases WHERE disease_name = 'Powdery Mildew'
SELECT cause, prevention FROM Crop_Diseases WHERE disease_name = 'Root Rot'
SELECT temperature, humidity FROM Weather_Data WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT * FROM Weather_Data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT disease_name, cause FROM Crop_Diseases WHERE LENGTH(cause) > 100 ORDER BY disease_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Weather_Data WHERE humidity < 50 AND temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT AVG(temperature) AS avg_temp, AVG(humidity) AS avg_humidity FROM Weather_Data;
SELECT * FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25.0
SELECT id, crop_name, planting_date FROM crop_data WHERE planting_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT disease_name, affected_crop FROM disease_data WHERE severity > 0.5 ORDER BY severity DESC
SELECT id, temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE pressure < 1000.0
SELECT * FROM crop_data WHERE crop_type = 'Fruit' ORDER BY planting_date DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, temperature FROM weather_data ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 3;
SELECT id, crop_name, crop_type FROM crop_data WHERE planting_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM disease_data WHERE severity > 0.5 ORDER BY severity ASC, id DESC;
SELECT id, humidity, pressure FROM weather_data WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT id, disease_name, affected_crop, severity FROM disease_data WHERE severity > 0.7 ORDER BY severity DESC;
SELECT * FROM weather_data ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25;
SELECT * FROM crop_info ORDER BY crop_name ASC;
SELECT crop_name, disease_susceptibility, recommended_actions FROM crop_info WHERE disease_susceptibility > 0.5;
SELECT date, crop_name, detected FROM disease_records WHERE detected = TRUE;
SELECT date, temperature, humidity FROM weather_data WHERE temperature > 25 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM crop_info WHERE disease_susceptibility BETWEEN 0.5 AND 0.8 ORDER BY crop_name ASC;
SELECT date, crop_name, disease_name FROM disease_records WHERE detected = TRUE ORDER BY date ASC, crop_name DESC;
SELECT date, forecasted_temperature, forecasted_humidity, forecasted_precipitation FROM weather_forecast WHERE forecasted_precipitation > 0.5 ORDER BY date ASC;
SELECT crop_name, recommended_actions FROM crop_info WHERE recommended_actions LIKE '%sunny%' OR recommended_actions LIKE '%rainy%' ORDER BY crop_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM WeatherData ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT temperature, humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 30
SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE humidity < 50 AND precipitation > 0.5
SELECT temperature, humidity, precipitation FROM WeatherData ORDER BY humidity ASC
SELECT id, date FROM WeatherData WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT * FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature > 25 AND humidity < 60 ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT MAX(temperature) AS max_temperature, MIN(temperature) AS min_temperature FROM WeatherData WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT AVG(humidity) AS avg_humidity, SUM(precipitation) AS total_precipitation FROM WeatherData WHERE date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31'
SELECT id, temperature, humidity FROM WeatherData WHERE temperature BETWEEN 20 AND 30 AND humidity > 50 ORDER BY humidity DESC, date ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT id, temperature, precipitation FROM WeatherData WHERE precipitation > 0.5 ORDER BY precipitation DESC, id ASC LIMIT 5
